text:
Sometimes the bounds given by the WMFHeaderProperties class is incorrect (less
than the real bounds of the figure). THe result is a cropped SVG image (see the
examples given for BUG 40368)
creator: herve.girod@club-internet.fr
herve.girod@club-internet.fr
text:
(In reply to comment #0)
See bug 40368 for the patch correcting this bug.

Herve Girod
